arts.ttl: Inter vs. Verona, 3 points in the midday fixture
arts.sum: Two contrasting sides in terms of goal scorers in Serie A 2025/26: Verona (like Pisa and Parma) have had just 3 different players on the scoresheet, while Inter boast 10 (matching Atalanta). At Verona, the two sides have met 36 times in competitive fixtures: 6 wins for the Gialloblù (most recently 1-0 in Serie A 1991/92), 11 draws (most recently 2-2 in Serie A 2023/24), and 19 Nerazzurri victories (most recently 5-0 in last season`s Serie A).
